mapper.update:
UPDATE AC_ENTITY
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_app = #{guid_app,jdbcType=varchar},
entity_name = #{entity_name,jdbcType=varchar},
table_name = #{table_name,jdbcType=varchar},
entity_desc = #{entity_desc,jdbcType=varchar},
display_order = #{display_order,jdbcType=decimal},
entity_type = #{entity_type,jdbcType=varchar},
isadd = #{isadd,jdbcType=char},
isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=char},
ismodify = #{ismodify,jdbcType=char},
isview = #{isview,jdbcType=char},
ispage = #{ispage,jdbcType=char},
page_len = #{page_len,jdbcType=decimal},
check_ref = #{check_ref,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
